data.title: Stunning
data.text: We attended a wedding at this church and it was beautiful, old historic just everything.  Such a beautiful church.

data.title: Special place for us
data.text: This church in the heart of downtown Tampa is gorgeous.  A very old parish with lots of history.  They now have tours by Docents of the Friends of Sacred Heart, on Sunday, November 13, 2016 at 1:15 PM.

data.title: Beautiful Church
data.text: Attended a wedding here and thoroughly enjoyed the church.  Very old, 1904, but full of beautiful ornate windows and religious items.  Got to see it to really appreciate it.  Mass was very nice.

data.title: Beautiful traditional-designed Church
data.text: Went for Sunday evening mass. It is a really beautiful old church. There was a really heavy storm after Mass, so everybody had to stay on for a while. Gave me the chance to interact with some youths who where studying in the Uni across the street. Friendly people in the church. Even got well wishes from the parish priest as I was going to celebrate my wedding anniversary later in the week. A must-go for all Catholics.

data.title: Icon of Tampa!
data.text: Tampa's oldest Catholic Church and also an icon of downtown Tampa.  If you like architecture then stop by and see this wonderful specimen of a Catholic church.  It's worth a quick peek inside to see the grand alter and stained glass windows.

data.title: Beautiful church for mass or getting married!!!
data.text: This church will awe you from the first time you lay eyes on it!!! But wait till you get inside. Just takes your breath away!! So beautiful!

data.title: Excellent experience if you are Catholic
data.text: Definitely one of the most beautiful Catholic churches in town. If you are a Catholic believer and want to attend a nice Sunday Mass, I would recommend a visit here.

data.title: Beautiful Church!!!!
data.text: We just happened to be walking by just before the 12:15 daily Mass.    The church is very clean and well kept.   Enjoyed the Homily and had a nice visit with the Franciscan priest afterward.

data.title: Beautiful Church
data.text: Very beautiful Cathedral to look it. Not very religious but its a very nice place to visit and the admire the details and art within the church. Very peaceful and its close to other places to visit.

data.title: Beautiful church in downtown Tampa
data.text: Very beautiful gothic-style church in downtown Tampa.  Amazing stained glass windows.  Looks more like a cathedral than a parish church.  We had a guest priest at the mass we attended, so I cannot comment on the local Franciscan priests.

data.title: Please stopping calling it Gothic!!!!
data.text: The style is Romanesque Revival , and as everyone has previously stated this 1905 house of worship is THE architectural crown jewel of Tampa. Even if you are in downtown for business, take an extra 15 minutes to walk through it.

data.title: Beautiful restored Catholic Church
data.text: Visited here during a morning when no services were there.  Only one other person in the church so explored and took photos of the beautiful alter, some of the stained glass, the rose windows, the magnificent pipe organ in the balcony and the dome above the altar area.  It was very carefully restored and was in gorgeous condition.  We explored a little, offered several prayers and left happy we were able to visit

data.title: Loved it! You just don't see churches like this anymore
data.text:
I took my four children-16, 14, 10 & 8. I appreciate that they are open to the public. It was just beautiful. We were free to walk around the sanctuary and appreciate the stained glass, carvings and statues. 
It was free, but of course there are a few donation boxes that hopefully are used generously and often to help keep this amazing piece of history maintained and open for all of us to enjoy. Truly a majestic and opulent place of worship.

data.title: Heaven on Earth!
data.text: I went to 7am Mass there on a Thursday morning. Arrived early. The church was quiet, with beautiful Gregorian Chant playing softly in the background. All the Franciscan priests there seem so happy, with joyful spirits. So glad I found this House of God!

data.title: Easter Sunday
data.text: This is a Beautiful Catholic Church! The architecture and detailed design is a must see while in Tampa! We enjoyed Easter Sunday Mass there this year while on.Spring Break.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: Sacred Heart is beautiful Church. We come to Mass here all the time and it is very nice. I would definitely recommend coming here.

data.title: Just beautiful. What a Catholic Church should feel like.
data.text: This is a traditional Catholic Church. Makes you feel very welcome and gives you a sense of tranquility. We love it.

data.title: beautiful
data.text: Great place with 2 daily Masses and BEAUTIFUL architecture. Run by Franciscan Friars. has full schedule of sacraments and activities.

data.title: Beautiful Church!
data.text: Depending on what day you go to mass, parking can be a challenge. Please keep in mind to arrive early in the morning. Overall,  it is a wonderful place to visit!

data.title: Beautiful church with amazing stained glass
data.text: Calm, peaceful and incredible stained glass.  We were able to walk inside and look at the stained glass and painting.  A Tampa treasure
